Disney Dropped The Trailer Of The Lion King & People Are Disappointed With Scar's New Look!
The wait is finally over. For those who grew up in the 90s exactly know what we're talking about. Seeing the animated version of Lion King was super special and now we have a full-fledged live action trailer of The Lion King.
Disney/screengrab
After their teaser, Disney released the trailer of their first live action remake of the movie after the success of The Jungle Book. The upcoming film stars the voices of Donald Glover, Seth Rogen, Chiwetel Ejiofor, Billy Eichner, John Oliver, Keegan-Michael Key, Beyoncé Knowles-Carter, and James Earl Jones.
Disney/Screengrab
The movie journeys to the African savanna where a future king must overcome betrayal and tragedy to assume his rightful place on Pride Rock. Most people are looking forward to the movie thanks to Simba's adorable looks but some are extremely disappointed with the way Scar has been portrayed on-screen. From calling him malnutritioned to massacred, Internet is upset with the look of the Lion. Before you check out the comments, watch the trailer and decide.

Here are some of the reactions and thoughts after seeing the trailer.
Look at how they MASSACRED my boy😩#notmyscar pic.twitter.com/RCtYHQwTj3 — I Want Daddy Thanos to Snap My Asshole (@Reginald_Sass) April 10, 2019
okay, I like the new lion king trailer. I’m just wondering how we’re supposed to tell these lions and lionesses apart when they all look like real animals. Scar isn’t even darker or anything. He just looks like he got ran over by a truck. #NotMyScar — Alex (@Alexander_TG12) April 10, 2019
Disney took the majestic being that is Scar and turned him into a ragged lion without luscious, dark mane. Just.... why. #NotMyScar — Erin Laidley (@eclaidley) April 10, 2019
Also I am just going to say it. This is #NotMyScar. I will forever call this lion "Not Scar" because I refuse to believe that Not Scar is actually the wonderful villain from the superior 1994 film. pic.twitter.com/t46faO1Qqm — T Y L Ǝ R (@IntrepidMegan) April 10, 2019
WTF I watched the new lion king trailer and bruhhh why’d they do scar like that. He looks and sounds terrible. No one does that voice like Jeremy Irons. 🙄 #smh #TheLionKing2019 #NotMyScar — Brandi S. (@Brandi_lynn87) April 11, 2019
WTF I watched the new lion king trailer and bruhhh why’d they do scar like that. He looks and sounds terrible. No one does that voice like Jeremy Irons. 🙄 #smh #TheLionKing2019 #NotMyScar — Brandi S. (@Brandi_lynn87) April 11, 2019
I am officially boycotting The Lion King for the next 3 months because Jeremy Irons is not playing Scar. #NotMyScar — Jayson (@birdman15) April 10, 2019
Simba idolizes his father, King Mufasa, and takes to heart his own royal destiny. But not everyone in the kingdom celebrates the new cub’s arrival. Scar, Mufasa’s brother and former heir to the throne has plans of his own and is the villain of the film.
Directed by Jon Favreau, Lion King is all set to release on July 19, 2019.
